name: idle arcade - make lvl construct 2 game
name_original: idle arcade - make lvl construct 2 game
description:
Earn money to create levels.
The more difficult the level, the more money.
For creating levels, there are different blocks: from teleporting to platforms.
idle arcade - make lvl a game in which you create levels and earn on it. Just don’t overdo it, you still need your level to pass.
